original_text: No other nation has done what you have done! Send people across the sea to islands in the west. Or send them to the deserts in the east. Let them find out if any other people have done this terrible thing. No other nation has done what you have done! Send people across the sea to islands in the west. Or send them to the deserts in the east. Let them find out if any other people have done this terrible thing. No other nation has done what you have done!
korean_text: 너희는 깃딤 섬들에 건너가 보며 게달에도 사람을 보내 이같은 일이 있었는지를 자세히 살펴보라

sentences.original_text: No other nation has done what you have done!
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 나라도 당신이 한 일을 하지 않았습니다!

sentences.original_text: Or send them to the deserts
if any other people have done this terrible thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 민족이 이 끔찍한 일을 했는지.

sentences.original_text: No other nation has done what you have done!
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 나라도 당신이 한 일을 하지 않았습니다!

sentences.original_text: Or send them to the deserts
if any other people have done this terrible thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 민족이 이 끔찍한 일을 했는지.

sentences.original_text: No other nation has done what you have done!
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 나라도 당신이 한 일을 하지 않았습니다!
